title: Central Air, great block, local landlord: rowhome for rent
description:
On a charming tree-lined block in Fishtown, your next home is just a short walk to Riverwards Produce, the Berks El stop and Palmer Park. In fact, on the same block, your friends meet you to sit outside at Mural City Winery.
This two-bedroom home with central air, great natural light and charming features is ideal for a couple trying out the neighborhood who want a comfy home office, or two friends splitting a space in a welcoming neighborhood.
The high-ceilings make the home feel even more welcoming. Walk into your cozy living room, then back to your dining room and kitchen. Out back, there's enough space for a table for four, a grill, your HVAC and a garden too. The basement has storage space and a washer-dryer. Upstairs, your two bedrooms and bathroom are well-spaced.
Move-in costs: first and last month's rent plus a $1,000 deposit. An additional $250 deposit is required for dogs, though they're otherwise welcome.
600 credit score required, though lower may be accepted with co-signer.

title: Charming One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: INCREDIBLE HOME WITH EXTRA LARGE SIDE YARD!
description: Look no further than this spacious 2BD/1BA home in Fishtown. Tastefully renovated, prime location, and amazing yard space! Make your way into the inviting living space filled with exposed brick, hardwood flooring, and an open concept floor plan. The renovated kitchen features warm wood cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and access to the backyard space. The vast back yard encompasses a cemented patio space and full side yard! With a little work, this backyard could be an oasis for entertaining guests, family gatherings, or your own private city garden! The opportunity here is rare! Upstairs is home to 2 nice sized bedrooms with hardwood flooring and a full hall bathroom with a window offering great natural light. Also there is a full, dry basement; perfect for storage and a washer/dryer as well. Did we mention location? Located on the edge of Fishtown, this home is in close proximity to everything Fishtown, East Kensington, and Port Richmond have to offer. Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Newer construction home in Northern Liberties available for rent
description:
Hello,
Whole home in the Northern Liberties neighborhood (4th St and Fairmount Ave) available for rent with move-in around mid June/early July. Exact date is flexible. 3bd 3.5ba (3 full, 2 half); one private off-street parking space included.
The existing lease runs to September 30, 2022 and can be renewed. If you're interested in renewing, property management can fold this into the paperwork up front.
This a large house, with a fully finished basement, modern deluxe kitchen, and comes with a private roof deck and rear patio. The location is great- 5 minutes away from the Spring Garden MFL stop (Fishtown is walkable but is just one MFL stop away). Stores like Target and CVS are just a few blocks away, along with many great bars and restaurants. A grocery store (Acme) is in the neighborhood an Asian grocery is two blocks away. More details are as below if you'd like more information. Any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
House details:
- Newer construction in Northern Liberties, around 4th and Fairmount. Community is called SoNo26
- Three main floors, a large basement, large roof deck. Around 2,690 sqft in total
- First floor has expansive, open floor plan.
- 3 bedrooms in total, 3 full baths, and 2 half baths
- Modern design
- Wired for FiOS internet
- Plenty of storage space throughout the house
- One assigned parking space in off-street lot
Master Bedroom description:
- Located on the 3rd floor
- Large walk-in closet
- Enormous deluxe private bath. Dual vanity plus, sweeping glass walk-in shower, and has its own linen closet.
- The third floor also has an additional half-bath & hallway closet and is one level down from the roof deck.
Medium Bedroom description:
- Located on the 2nd floor
- Quite large, has attached private bath.
- Lots of sunlight
Third Bedroom description:
- Located on the 2nd floor
- Large closet, detached full bath and linen closet right outside door.
Kitchen:
- Stainless steel appliances throughout. Gas range, large refrigerator with water/ice dispenser, and integrated microwave
- Large sink with restaurant-style faucet and garbage disposal
- Plenty of cabinet and counter space
- Open floor plan flows directly into living room
Basement:
- Finished, large, well-lit, with a half-bath
- GE washer and dryer located in basement
- Ample storage space
- Plenty of space for home office, home gym, and/or home entertainment center
Neighborhood:
- SoNo26 is located near 4th and Fairmount, in Northern Liberties
- The Spring Garden MFL station is 2.5 blocks away. The MFL can take you almost anywhere in the city in minutes
- Acme is about a mile away and can be biked to in five minutes
- CVS is two blocks away
- City Fitness is two blocks away
- Asian supermarket is two blocks away
- Popular bars and restaurants such as The Abbaye, Dos Segundos, Honey's Sit-And-Eat, Cafe La Maude, and Yards Brewery are close by
- Northern Liberties Community Center is across the street
- 5-minute drive to I-95 and I-676
Rent: $3500/mo
- Security deposit and last month of rent due upon signing of lease. Existing lease is runs through 9/30/22 and can be renewed.
- Utilities usually range from ~$225 - $275 / month (PECO, PGW, water, and FiOS).

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Gym, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 1110 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 11th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as May 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 11th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to see if 1110 is still listed under the Dali floor plan. If interested, then please make an appointment to tour using Resmate, our robot concierge on our website 24/7. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: Filter Square - Charming 3 bed 2 bath house w/ patio!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

5512 Crowson St, Philadelphia, PA 19144-1302$1,200.00 / Month- Description:To schedule a showing, submit an application or for our leasing criteria, please visit www.KHPPM.com/leasing.This wonderful 3 bed home is located in the East Germantown part of Philadelphia. 5512 Crowson St, Philadelphia, PA 19144 has 1,200 sq.ft. which offers beautiful natural light and inviting living space. This gem is located in a great community near shopping, public transportation, parks and schools. 5512 Crowson St will not be on the market for long!This home features both a crisp, clean bathroom and a modernized kitchen. Some of the updates include: fresh paint, oak cabinets, hardwood floors, granite counter tops with updated kitchen appliances. This residence also has central heat and laundry on the premises.This property has a friendly and reliable management team in place to respond promptly to our residents.Resident pays for water, gas and electric where applicable. This is a pet friendly home for approved animals only. We require a non-refundable administrative fee of $200 for the first pet, and $100 for an additional pet, PLUS a non-refundable monthly rent of $10 per pet and $300K in Renters Insurance for animals over 25lbs. No animals over 25lbs are permitted in multifamily units. In order to qualify, resident must gross a monthly income of three and a half times the monthly rent. TO MOVE IN, resident must pay first & last month's rent, as well as a security deposit, all in certified funds.Please visit our website as we may have a 3D virtual tour available for viewing.
